title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, March 29, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1944 that Anne Frank made the decision to rewrite her diary as an autobiography so that history might understand what the Jews of Europe had suffered.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1944 that Anne Frank made the decision to rewrite her diary as an autobiography so that history might understand what the Jews of Europe had suffered.
